name: Red Cabbage Chicken Egg Salad
description: Indulge in a refreshing blend of crunch and flavor with our Red Cabbage Chicken Egg Salad. Perfect for those seeking a high-fiber and healthified meal, this recipe beautifully combines tender boiled chicken, crisp red cabbage, juicy apples, and more for a delightful and nutritious experience.
recipeIngredient: 0.11 head small (4" dia), Cabbage, red, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Start by hard boiling the egg. Place the egg in a saucepan, cover with water, bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 9 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: While the egg is cooking, slice the red cabbage thinly and chop the honey crisp apple into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the boiled chicken breast and baby carrots into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the ice burg lettuce into thin strips and slice the young corn.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Once the egg is done, place it in cold water to cool before peeling and chopping it into pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large salad bowl, combine the sliced red cabbage, chopped apple, chicken breast, baby carrots, ice burg lettuce, young corn, and chopped egg.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the ingredients together until well mixed. Serve this nourishing salad chilled for a refreshing and healthy meal.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
